author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Shop the @PureArts  The Lord of the Rings line here: https://www.purearts.com/collections/the-lord-of-the-rings?sca_ref=1728901.fPfFhiiu4f

Also available from @CollectorZown  : https://www.collectorzown.com/search?type=product&q=purearts  Save 15% with code: NOTR

Product Description:
PureArts crafts a hyper-realistic 1/1 scale art mask of Gollum, complete with silicon skin, glass eyes, and individually punched synthetic hair. Channeling the infamous moment when Gollum leads Frodo and Sam to the lair of Shelob, The Gollum 1/1 Scale Art Mask sits atop a Cirith Ungol staircase base featuring his precious One Ring with LED-lit black speech inscription. The fifth installment of the PureArts Lord of the Rings collection is set to be the most precious piece in your Lord of the Rings collection!

Features:
Hyper-realistic art mask replica of Gollum from The Lord of the Rings
Individually punched synthetic hair
Hyper-detailed glass eyes
Textured silicone skin, polyresin backing
Sculpted Ciri
title: Unboxing the AWESOMELY CREEPY Gollum Art Mask by PureArts!
